sections.heading: Responsive verdicts; in generalIn all cases not provided for in Article 814, the following verdicts are responsive:(1) Guilty;(2) Guilty of a lesser and included grade of the offense even though the offense charged is a felony, and the lesser offense a misdemeanor; or(3) Not Guilty
sections.text: Responsive verdicts; in generalIn all cases not provided for in Article 814, the following verdicts are responsive:(1) Guilty;(2) Guilty of a lesser and included grade of the offense even though the offense charged is a felony, and the lesser offense a misdemeanor; or(3) Not Guilty.
